title: "AWS sponsors Toitū Te Whenua – Land Information NZ to upload geospatial imagery"
excerpt: "By extending access of these images from the Land Information NZ (LINZ) data service to AWS, Toitū Te Whenua has reduced the time it takes for bulk retrieval of aerial data from several weeks to just a day, and made it easier for people and organisations to access and analyse the data."
